fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Summon a floating shark to patrol someone’s house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target is visited, your shark will bite all of their visitors, drawing their blood.
- If your shark patrols at someone’s house whose blood was drawn, your shark will deal a Basic attack to them and not bite any visitors.
- If your target is attacked by something other than yourself, your shark will increase the attack value of that attack by one.
- With the Necronomicon, your shark will always deal a Basic attack to your target.
